com.cognifide.qa.bb.qualifier

Annotation Type PageObject


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface PageObject
    PageObject is a central concept of Bobcat. It's a term derived from Selenium framework and it means a class that encapsulates page HTML and exposes page features. Add this annotation to classes that represent pages or components within pages.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String css
      Use this property to identify the page object by css selector
      boolean generateCurrentScope
      This indicates whether classes annotated with this annotation should or should not generate currentScope web element.
      String xpath
      Use this property to identify the page object by xpath selector

    • Element Detail

      • css

        public abstract String css
        Use this property to identify the page object by css selector
        Returns:
        page object css class
        Default:
        ""

      • xpath

        public abstract String xpath
        Use this property to identify the page object by xpath selector
        Returns:
        page object xpath
        Default:
        ""

      • generateCurrentScope

        public abstract boolean generateCurrentScope
        This indicates whether classes annotated with this annotation should or should not generate currentScope web element. When it's true it declares the following field: @CurrentScope @Inject private WebElement currentScope; When this is true, but field of name currentScope has been already defined this switch has no effect and the field will not be generated.
        Default:
        true
